# Welcome to Earth and Space Science {.unnumbered}

Welcome to your interactive Earth and Space Science textbook! This course explores the dynamic systems of our planet and the vastness of our universe.

## Course Overview

This curriculum is based on the [New Visions for Public Schools](https://www.newvisions.org/curriculum/science/earth-space/) Earth & Space Science course, aligned with NGSS and New York State Science Learning Standards.

## What You'll Explore

| Unit | Driving Question | Key Concepts |
|------|------------------|--------------|
| 1 | How do we discover new worlds? | Sun's lifespan, star life cycles, solar system |
| 2 | What is the probability of life elsewhere? | Big Bang, early Earth, water, evolution |
| 3 | Who's at risk from earthquakes, volcanoes, and tsunamis? | Plate tectonics, Earth's interior, hazards |
| 4 | How is our climate changing? | Moon phases, Earth systems, carbon cycle |
| 5 | Will NYC see more hurricanes and blizzards? | Severe weather, climate impacts |
| 6 | How can we create a sustainable future? | Solutions, mitigation, adaptation |
